languages.text: "Но не все, что опасно, есть зло. Немногие осмелятся открыто заявить это, но часть наших знаний была обретена из скверных источников. Изучая творения ксеносов, мы постигали секреты мироздания, до которых они догадались, а мы — нет. Созерцая ересь, мы изобретали технологические решения по истреблению ее. Черпая из отравленного источника, мы проводили знание через фильтры и обретали Понимание".

"But not all that is dangerous is evil. Few will dare say it in so many words, but some of our knowledge was obtained from corrupted sources. By studying the creations of xenos, we grasped profound secrets of the universe that they had discovered and we had not. By pondering heresies, we devised technological solutions to exterminate them. We drew knowledge from a poisoned well, filtered it, and attained Comprehension."
languages.original_text: "Но не все, что опасно, есть зло. Немногие осмелятся открыто заявить это, но часть наших знаний была обретена из скверных источников. Изучая творения ксеносов, мы постигали секреты мироздания, до которых они догадались, а мы — нет. Созерцая ересь, мы изобретали технологические решения по истреблению ее. Черпая из отравленного источника, мы проводили знание через фильтры и обретали Понимание".

By studying the creations of xenos, we grasped profound secrets of the universe which they had discovered and we had not. By pondering heresies, we came up with technological solutions to exterminate them. We drew knowledge from a poisoned well, filtered it, and attained Comprehension."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

By studying the creations of xenos, we grasped profound secrets of the universe that they had discovered and we had not. By pondering heresies, we devised technological solutions to exterminate them. We drew knowledge from a poisoned well, filtered it, and attained Comprehension."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “然而，并非所有危险的东西都是邪恶之物。虽然很少有人敢说出这样的话，但我们的一部分知识，恰恰是从被腐化的源头得到的。通过研究异形的造物，我们理解了那些他们早已掌握，但我们尚未掌握的宇宙深层次的秘密。通过思考异端邪说，我们找到了技术方案来解决它们。我们从毒井中汲取知识，对其进行过滤，获得了理解力。”
languages.original_text: "But not all that is dangerous is evil. Few will dare say it in so many words, but some of our knowledge was obtained from corrupted sources. By studying the creations of xenos, we grasped profound secrets of the universe that they had discovered and we had not. By pondering heresies, we devised technological solutions to exterminate them. We drew knowledge from a poisoned well, filtered it, and attained Comprehension."

traits.locale_text: “然而，并非所有危险的东西都是邪恶之物。虽然很少有人敢说出这样的话，但我们的一部分知识，恰恰是从被腐化的源头得到的。通过研究异形的造物，我们理解了那些他们早已掌握，但我们尚未掌握的宇宙深层次的秘密。通过思考异端邪说，我们找到了技术方案来解决它们。我们从毒井中汲取知识，对其进行过滤，获得了理解力。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Sin embargo, no todo lo peligroso es malvado. No hay muchos que se atrevan a decirlo expresamente, pero parte de nuestro conocimiento viene de orígenes corruptos. Al estudiar las creaciones de los xenos pudimos desentrañar misterios del universo que ellos habían entendido y nosotros no. Al meditar sobre las herejías, encontramos soluciones tecnológicas con las que erradicarlas. Extrajimos el conocimiento de un pozo envenenado y, al filtrarlo, alcanzamos la comprensión».
languages.original_text: "But not all that is dangerous is evil. Few will dare say it in so many words, but some of our knowledge was obtained from corrupted sources. By studying the creations of xenos, we grasped profound secrets of the universe that they had discovered and we had not. By pondering heresies, we devised technological solutions to exterminate them. We drew knowledge from a poisoned well, filtered it, and attained Comprehension."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, no todo lo peligroso es malvado. No hay muchos que se atrevan a decirlo expresamente, pero parte de nuestro conocimiento viene de orígenes corruptos. Al estudiar las creaciones de los xenos pudimos desentrañar misterios del universo que ellos habían entendido y nosotros no. Al meditar sobre las herejías, encontramos soluciones tecnológicas con las que erradicarlas. Extrajimos el conocimiento de un pozo envenenado y, al filtrarlo, alcanzamos la comprensión».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「しかし、危険なものすべてが悪というわけではない。それをあえて語ろうとする者は少ないだろうが、我々の知識の一部は堕落した情報源から得られたものである。異種族の創造物を研究することで、私たちは彼らが発見し、自分たちが発見できなかった宇宙の奥深い秘密をつかんだ。異端に思いを馳せることで、彼らを絶滅させるための技術的解決策を考案した。自分らは毒の井戸から知識を汲み上げ、濾過し、理解を得たのだ」
languages.original_text: "But not all that is dangerous is evil. Few will dare say it in so many words, but some of our knowledge was obtained from corrupted sources. By studying the creations of xenos, we grasped profound secrets of the universe that they had discovered and we had not. By pondering heresies, we devised technological solutions to exterminate them. We drew knowledge from a poisoned well, filtered it, and attained Comprehension."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、危険なものすべてが悪というわけではない。それをあえて語ろうとする者は少ないだろうが、我々の知識の一部は堕落した情報源から得られたものである。異種族の創造物を研究することで、私たちは彼らが発見し、自分たちが発見できなかった宇宙の奥深い秘密をつかんだ。異端に思いを馳せることで、彼らを絶滅させるための技術的解決策を考案した。自分らは毒の井戸から知識を汲み上げ、濾過し、理解を得たのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Doch nicht alles, was gefährlich ist, ist auch böse. Nur wenige wagen es, das auszusprechen, doch ein Teil unseres Wissens stammt aus beschädigten Quellen. Indem wir die Schöpfungen der Xenos studiert haben, haben wir profunde Geheimnisse des Universums verstanden, welche sie bereits entdeckt hatten, wir jedoch noch nicht. Indem wir uns mit Ketzereien beschäftigt haben, haben wir technologische Lösungen ersonnen, sie auszulöschen. Wir haben Wissen aus einem vergifteten Quell geschöpft, es gefiltert und so Verständnis erlangt."
languages.original_text: "But not all that is dangerous is evil. Few will dare say it in so many words, but some of our knowledge was obtained from corrupted sources. By studying the creations of xenos, we grasped profound secrets of the universe that they had discovered and we had not. By pondering heresies, we devised technological solutions to exterminate them. We drew knowledge from a poisoned well, filtered it, and attained Comprehension."

traits.locale_text: "Doch nicht alles, was gefährlich ist, ist auch böse. Nur wenige wagen es, das auszusprechen, doch ein Teil unseres Wissens stammt aus beschädigten Quellen. Indem wir die Schöpfungen der Xenos studiert haben, haben wir profunde Geheimnisse des Universums verstanden, welche sie bereits entdeckt hatten, wir jedoch noch nicht. Indem wir uns mit Ketzereien beschäftigt haben, haben wir technologische Lösungen ersonnen, sie auszulöschen. Wir haben Wissen aus einem vergifteten Quell geschöpft, es gefiltert und so Verständnis erlangt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Mais ce qui est dangereux n'est pas forcément mauvais. Peu oseraient le dire en ces termes, mais certaines de nos connaissances ont pour origine des sources corrompues. En étudiant les créations des xénos, nous avons pu saisir les secrets profonds de l'univers qu'eux avaient découverts, mais pas nous. En nous interrogeant sur les hérésies, nous avons pu mettre au point des solutions technologiques afin de mieux les exterminer. Nous extrayons le savoir d'un puits empoisonné, nous le filtrons et c'est ainsi que nous recevons la Compréhension. »
languages.original_text: "But not all that is dangerous is evil. Few will dare say it in so many words, but some of our knowledge was obtained from corrupted sources. By studying the creations of xenos, we grasped profound secrets of the universe that they had discovered and we had not. By pondering heresies, we devised technological solutions to exterminate them. We drew knowledge from a poisoned well, filtered it, and attained Comprehension."

traits.locale_text: « Mais ce qui est dangereux n'est pas forcément mauvais. Peu oseraient le dire en ces termes, mais certaines de nos connaissances ont pour origine des sources corrompues. En étudiant les créations des xénos, nous avons pu saisir les secrets profonds de l'univers qu'eux avaient découverts, mais pas nous. En nous interrogeant sur les hérésies, nous avons pu mettre au point des solutions technologiques afin de mieux les exterminer. Nous extrayons le savoir d'un puits empoisonné, nous le filtrons et c'est ainsi que nous recevons la Compréhension. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "But not all that is dangerous is evil. Few will dare say it in so many words, but some of our knowledge was obtained from corrupted sources. By studying the creations of xenos, we grasped profound secrets of the universe that they had discovered and we had not. By pondering heresies, we devised technological solutions to exterminate them. We drew knowledge from a poisoned well, filtered it, and attained Comprehension."

languages.text: "Tehlike barındıran her şey de kötü değildir. Bunları sözcüklere döken fazla kimse bulunmaz belki ama irfanımızın bir kısmı yozlaşmış kaynaklardan edinilmiştir. Zeno yaratımları üzerinde çalışarak evrenin engin sırlarına eriştik. Onlar bunları keşfetmişti, bizse keşfetmemiştik. Kâfirlikler üzerine düşünerek onları yok edecek teknolojik çözümler ürettik. İrfanı zehirli bir kuyudan çektik, filtreden geçirdik ve İdrak elde ettik."
languages.original_text: "But not all that is dangerous is evil. Few will dare say it in so many words, but some of our knowledge was obtained from corrupted sources. By studying the creations of xenos, we grasped profound secrets of the universe that they had discovered and we had not. By pondering heresies, we devised technological solutions to exterminate them. We drew knowledge from a poisoned well, filtered it, and attained Comprehension."

traits.locale_text: "Tehlike barındıran her şey kötü değildir ama. Bunları sözcüklere döken fazla kişi bulunmaz belki ama irfanımızın bir kısmı yozlaşmış kaynaklardan edinilmiştir. Zeno yaratımları üzerinde çalışarak, onların keşfettiği ama bizim keşfetmediğimiz evrenin engin sırlarına eriştik. Kâfirlikler üzerine düşünerek, onları yok edecek teknolojik çözümler ürettik. İrfanı zehirli bir kuyudan çektik, filtreden geçirdik ve İdrak elde ettik."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
